article_title: Vasquez, who owns and operates the second-oldest barbershop in Nebraska, says it’s all about people
article_text:
We have used your information to see if you have a subscription with us, but did not find one.

article_metadata.description: KEARNEY — Todd “Walt” Walton, an engineer with the Kearney Volunteer Fire Department, headed straight to the Downtown Barber Shop and Shave Parlor at 2319 Central Ave. when he got off his 24-hour shift Feb. 26. He sat down in the chair of shop co-owner Joshua Vasquez and closed his eyes as Vasquez covered his head with a warm towel.
